definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: The Honolulu Blue Guest Room is a cozy cool escape from the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 檀香山藍色客房舒適涼爽，適合躲避夏日豔陽。

sentences.english: Each room is equipped with smoking detection system.
sentences.chinese: 酒店每間客房均設有煙感報警器。

sentences.english: George showed me to the guest-room which, he said, was rarely used.
sentences.chinese: 喬治把我領進客房，說這間房間很少使用。

sentences.english: Floral wallpaper adorned the walls of the guest room.
sentences.chinese: 客房的牆上裱糊著有花卉圖案的壁紙。

sentences.english: Provide in-room safe deposit boxes service.
sentences.chinese: 提供客房內保險箱之服務。

sentences.english: The whole building has nine floors of guest rooms 220 rooms.
sentences.chinese: 全樓客房有九個樓層共220間房。

sentences.english: Room Service. Whfor can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 客房任事部，能爲您效用嗎？

sentences.english: The complex consists of 800 buildings with 8886 rooms.
sentences.chinese: 該綜合體由800棟建築和8886間客房組成。

sentences.english: I'm afraid all calls to guest room must go through the operator.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，所有打到客房的電話都要通過我們接線生轉。

sentences.english: Guest rooms at the Hôtel Restaurant La Crémaillère are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi connection.
sentences.chinese: 每間客房都配有空調，提供平面電視和無線網絡連接。

sentences.english: Guest room style mahjong room is on F5 of main building, used for accommodation and entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 客房式麻將屋位於主樓5樓，集住宿娛樂於一體。

sentences.english: These rooms would be lighted up every evening.
sentences.chinese: 客房裏的房間通宵達旦燈火通明。

sentences.english: Bathroom shows the ingenuity of the designer, with separate bath and shower to meet different needs.
sentences.chinese: 客房內精心設計的浴室還擁有獨立的衝淋和盆浴區域。

sentences.english: Apartments include free internet access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
sentences.chinese: 每間空調客房都配備了衛星電視和免費無線網絡連接。

sentences.english: This kind of hotels guest room facility, has strong topical generally.
sentences.chinese: 這類酒店的客房設施，一般有很強的主題性。

sentences.english: The Views from the Master Bedroom a goodd Guest room overlook the surf a goodd Maunwoulsua Bay.
sentences.chinese: 主臥室和客房的景觀俯瞰毛納魯爾灣的浪濤。

definition: hotel room with one double (or queen or king) bed
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
